publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-829♦ Charlie Gordon: Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme—That the Parliament believes that the national concessionary travel scheme should be urgently reviewed to extend eligibility to disabled people in receipt of the lower rate of disability living allowance, including those in Glasgow, and to older and disabled people using community transport in rural areas such as those in Clydesdale and that there should be consultation on other desirable changes to the scheme.
S3M-829♦ Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme (lodged on 13 November 2007) Trish Godman*

S3M-829♦ Charlie Gordon: Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme—That the Parliament believes that the national concessionary travel scheme should be urgently reviewed to extend eligibility to disabled people in receipt of the lower rate of disability living allowance, including those in Glasgow, and to older and disabled people using community transport in rural areas such as those in Clydesdale and that there should be consultation on other desirable changes to the scheme. Supported by: Trish Godman

S3M-829♦ Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme (lodged on 13 November 2007) Elaine Murray*, Robin Harper*, Bill Butler*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mary Mulligan*, Paul Martin*, James Kelly*, Pauline McNeill*, David Stewart*, Claire Baker*

S3M-829*#* Charlie Gordon: Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme—That the Parliament believes that the national concessionary travel scheme should be urgently reviewed to extend eligibility to disabled people in receipt of the lower rate of disability living allowance, including those in Glasgow, and to older and disabled people using community transport in rural areas such as those in Clydesdale and that there should be consultation on other desirable changes to the scheme. Supported by: Jackie Baillie*, John Park*, Alex Neil*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Iain Gray*, Karen Gillon*, Andy Kerr*, Karen Whitefield* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-829# Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme (lodged on 13 November 2007) Cathy Peattie*, Ken Macintosh*, Irene Oldfather*
S3M-829# Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme (lodged on 13 November 2007) Rob Gibson*
S3M-829# Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme (lodged on 13 November 2007) Lewis Macdonald*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-829# Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme (lodged on 13 November 2007) Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-829# Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme (lodged on 13 November 2007) Peter Peacock*
S3M-829# Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme (lodged on 13 November 2007) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-829# Changes to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme (lodged on 13 November 2007) Dr Richard Simpson*
